question:
Sher Shah Suri laid which of the following Highways?
1) Sonargaon to Sind
2) Agra to Burhampur
3) Jodhpur to Chittor
4) Lahore to Multan
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
Sher Shah also improved communications by building roads and called them the arteries of the empire. He laid four important highways. They were:
1) Sonargaon to Sind
2) Agra to Burhampur
3) Jodhpur to Chittor
4) Lahore to Multan
